description: Detects wmiexec/dcomexec/atexec/smbexec from Impacket framework Author: Ecco, oscd.community, Jonhnathan Ribeiro. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Impacket Lateralization Detection
query: (process.command_line:*cmd.exe* AND process.command_line:*&1* AND ((process.parent.executable:(*\\wmiprvse.exe OR *\\mmc.exe OR *\\explorer.exe OR *\\services.exe) AND process.command_line:*\/Q* AND process.command_line:*\/c* AND process.command_line:*\\\\127.0.0.1\\*) OR (process.parent.command_line:(*svchost.exe\ \-k\ netsvcs* OR *taskeng.exe*) AND process.command_line:*\/C* AND process.command_line:*Windows\\Temp\\*)))
